long: Meaning: properly, a "failure of", i.e. (used only as a negative particle, usually with a prepositional prefix) "not", "except", "without", "unless", "besides", "because not", "until", etc.  Usage: because un(satiable), beside, but,   continual, except, from, lest, neither, no more, none, not, nothing, save, that no, without.  Source: constructive feminine of "H1086" (equivalent to "H1097");
